original_title: Living Yoga: The Life and Teachings of Swami Satchidananda
overview: Living Yoga: The life and teachings of Swami Satchidananda How the ancient teachings of Yoga were brought to the West and the farreaching effects on society of the modern Yoga movement is a story told for the first time on film in an hourlong documentary that informs, entertains and provokes selfinquiry.
title: Living Yoga: The Life and Teachings of Swami Satchidananda
